b: ^[ He groans. A rasp of a voice follows. ]
^Chained Prisoner: "Another dreamer, then. Or… are you something worse?"

PAST_START: ^Chainer Prisoner: "You want to know what I was before the chains. Curious."
^What did you do to end up here?
PAST_IDENTITY: ^Chainer Prisoner: "I was a guard. A brother. A believer. All three. None, maybe."
PAST_BELIEVER: ^Chainer Prisoner: "In the Mask. In the Eye. In the lie. Whatever name you give it."
^You think it was a lie now?
PAST_FOLLOWED: ^Chainer Prisoner: "I didn’t follow. I knelt. That was the mistake."
PAST_DISILLUSION: ^Chainer Prisoner: "The truth's a blade. Sharp when you grip it too long."
PAST_REGRET: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Would you be sure, after years in chains?"
PAST_CRIME: ^Chainer Prisoner: "I tried to run. That’s all it takes. That’s all it ever takes."
PAST_RUN: ^Chainer Prisoner: "From it. From the Eye. From what I saw in myself when it stared back."
PAST_WRAPUP: ^Chainer Prisoner: "There’s nothing back there but broken promises and broken me."
YOU_START: ^Chainer Prisoner: "I see the weight in your eyes. Not yet a burden, but close."

b: ^Chainer Prisoner: "I see guilt. You wear it like a second skin. Heavy, isn’t it?"
^Chainer Prisoner: "You haven’t broken anything yet. That’s good. Or maybe you just haven’t looked close enough."

YOU_CHANGE: ^Chainer Prisoner: "No. But it gets harder. Every time you bleed, you heal uglier."
YOU_REFLECT: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Me? I'm a mirror. You talk to me, but you’re only ever talking to yourself."
YOU_REJECT: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Maybe. But I’ve seen enough to guess. You're not the first to wear that mask."
HELP_START: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Help? A word lighter than the chain you’ll have to break."
HELP_TRY: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Then try. But remember, pain listens better than mercy."
^[You grip a link. Heat burns through your skin as you pull, pull, pull.]
^Chainer Prisoner: "You... you did it. One chain."
HELP_FAIL: ^Chainer Prisoner: "No. You can't. Not yet. You’d snap before the metal does."
HELP_DENY: ^Chainer Prisoner: "Then you understand. Kindness is often a cruelty to both."

b: ^Chainer Prisoner: "You asked, you listened, and you tried. Maybe that’s all we’re ever meant to do. Not to save — but to understand."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You dug into the rot and stared into the mirror. That’s more than most. If the chains break, it’ll be because of people like you."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You learned what made me. Then you tried to unmake it. Be careful — chains aren't the only thing that snap."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You looked into me and saw yourself. Then tried to help. That’s dangerous, but… noble, maybe."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You asked about the past. That’s a beginning. Don’t stop there."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You tried to understand yourself through me. Just be careful how deep you dig."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You tried to help. That’s rare. Don’t let this world burn that out of you."
^Chainer Prisoner: "You came, stared, and left. Like all the rest. If you ever come back — come back as more."

LEAVE: ^You're back at the foot of the slope.
